title: Dragon Vocalizations
description: A Dragon Vocalization sound package with 240 high-quality big-monster sound effects, including battle, pain and neutral vocalizations, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/dragon-vocalizations

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/deru3avmrx4jehr/MSE%20-%20Dragon%20Vocalizations.pdf?dl=0


A Dragon is as old as a dinosaur, an enormous lizard-like creature that inspires terror in anyone with its power and size, whether a warrior or a wanderer. They are slow but extremely strong, with a scream capable of sweeping away anything in their path. They are excellent warriors and defenders, and can sometimes even be tamed.

All of its qualities formed the basis of the creature's creation and vocalization design.


The collection contains 14 voice actions, including 240 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 24 voice sounds during an attack
  • 12 battle shouts
  • 8 sounds of breath
  • 32 deaths
  • 12 groans
  • 40 growls
  • 8 idle and speech sounds
  • 12 sounds of jumping and action
  • 4 sounds of laughing
  • 24 pains
  • 32 roars
  • 12 snarling sounds
  • 12 snorting and grunting sounds
  • 8 victory shouts


Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs. 


This package is ideal for creating large and huge monster and boss voices: dinosaur, reptile, lizard, titan, giant, guardian, elemental, infernal creatures, undead dragon and more. 


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, post-apocalyptic, sci-fi, horror or any other where monsters live and roar. 


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 240 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 14 voice actions
  • 128 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 68 voice samples of the pain type
  • 44 neutral type voice samples
  • great for animations, trailers, game scenes for fantasy, dark fantasy, horror and more


Number of Audio Waves: 240

Number of Audio Cues: 240

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 07 minutes 20 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
